metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37967 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Windows Kerberos Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability

notes.Note: mdeslaur> The focal samba update was temporarily reverted by USN 5822-2 because it introduced regressions. It was later updated again with USN 5936-1.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
